cause.description:
Youth Encounter is an evangelical and confessional Christian organization that offers youth ministry resources to the church. Incorporated in Minnesota by Lutherans in 1965, the organization serves churches of all denominations, nationally and internationally.
1. Worshiping Christ.
2. Evangelizing the world.
3. Strengthening Christian communities.
4. Prospering young people.
5. Practicing Christian faithfulness.
6. Building relationships of integrity.
cause.mission: Partnering with Christian communities to strengthen their youth ministry.
cause.name: Youth Encounter
